scripts.build_l: npm run lint -p && rm -rf ./build && npm run tsc && npm run copy_data_to_build_folder_l
scripts.build_l_prod: npm run lint -p && rm -rf ./build && npm run tsc --sourceMap false && npm run copy_data_to_build_folder_l
scripts.deploy_l: npm run build_l_prod && npm run clean_server_folders_l && npm run move_files_to_server_l && cd /var/www/PersonalHomepageAPI/build/; npm install && npm run restart_server_l
scripts.build_w: npm run lint -p && rd /s /q "./build" && npm run tsc && npm run copy_data_to_build_folder_w
scripts.build_w_prod: npm run lint -p && rd /s /q "./build" && tsc --sourceMap false && npm run copy_data_to_build_folder_w
scripts.restart_server_w: ssh pi@192.168.0.200 sudo pm2 restart PersonalHomepageAPI
scripts.deploy_w: npm run build_w_prod && npm run clean_server_folders_w && npm run move_files_to_server_w && ssh pi@192.168.0.200 cd /var/www/PersonalHomepageAPI/build/; npm install && npm run restart_server_w
